headline: Apollo Investigations Raise Questions On Governance Risk And Valuation Gap
summary: Multiple law firms have opened investigations into Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) following allegations of potentially misleading business practices. Scrutiny has intensified after reports of past discussions between Apollo executives and Jeffrey Epstein regarding possible tax arrangements. The reviews focus on potential legal and governance risks that could affect Apollo’s standing with shareholders and clients. Apollo Global Management is a large alternative asset manager, active in...

headline: BofA Lifts PT on Apollo Global Management (APO) to $167 From $161 – Here’s Why
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the best cheap blue chip stocks to buy according to analysts. On February 24, BofA lifted the price target on Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) to $167 from $161 while maintaining a Buy rating on the shares. The firm told investors that it is revising EPS estimates […]
